developer.title: The Developer
developer.bio: I’m 23 years old, passionate about Java and typed languages, but I believe that "the best language is the one that solves the problem." I started my journey in mobile development, a field I still hold dear. Currently, I work as a full-stack developer, always striving to expand my knowledge and experiment with new technologies.
developer.details: I am constantly improving my skills and exploring concepts like microservices, atomic design, and SOLID principles. I enjoy integrating best practices and modern solutions into the projects I develop, ensuring efficiency and scalability while challenging myself to learn and innovate.

novacomp.description: Analyzed code and MongoDB to identify and prevent production issues. Used Datadog to monitor and troubleshoot system errors. Created TypeScript scripts to resolve production incidents.

stefanini.description: Full-Stack Development: Worked with TypeScript (Vue) and Django to design, build, and maintain a scalable platform with strong performance and maintainability. Automated Script Creation: Developed and optimized daily automation scripts for virtual machines, enhancing operational efficiency. Bug Resolution and Sprint Management: Debugged critical issues and contributed to agile sprint planning to support timely, high-quality releases.

fxbank.description: Built a React-based business dashboard to optimize client relations and transaction monitoring. Designed and implemented proprietary APIs using Node.js to automate financial transactions and payment splits. Delivered custom software tools to streamline internal processes and boost operational efficiency.

petrobras.description: Developed a mobile application called ASET to streamline customer support for IT issues. Java for application, built the backend using Node.js with a MySQL database. Utilized Firebase for authentication and real-time features.

realparceria.description: E-commerce Platform Development. Mobile Application Development (Android and iOS). Sales and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Solutions.
